english: power source; power supply; electrical source; mains power

etymology.description: 电 + 源 = source/origin of electricity (power supply).
etymology.interpretation: Names the origin or supply of electric power—anything that provides electrical energy, from batteries to wall outlets (mains). Common in technical and everyday contexts for power inputs and switches.
etymology.simplification: 電 → 电: simplified by reducing strokes and removing the 'rain' component; 源 unchanged.

examples.chinese: 把电脑接到电源(把電腦接到電源)。
examples.english: Connect the computer to a power source.

examples.chinese: 请关闭电源以免触电(請關閉電源以免觸電)。
examples.english: Please turn off the power to avoid electric shock.

examples.chinese: 这个充电器支持多种电源电压(這個充電器支持多種電源電壓)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège chōngdiànqì zhīchí duō zhǒng diànyuán diànyā.
examples.english: This charger supports multiple power supply voltages.
